entry.title: OpenEnergyMonitor Shop Christmas Ordering
entry.content:
Looking up at Snowon 1085m from Llyn Glasyn yesterday (20 min north of OEM labs), North Wales UK


The first snow of the year has fallen onto the Welsh mountains and the emoncms Bee Hive Temperature Monitor has recorded sub-zero temperatures in the valleys. This can only mean that winter is on its way! <div>
</div><div>The OpenEnergyMonitor online shop has been nice and busy recently; breaking the 1000th order mark a couple of weeks ago was a big milestone. Thank you to all of you who’ve ordered from the shop, you’re directly helping to support the project. The success of the shop has enabled us to contribute to the project full time; we have lots of ideas for 2013. </div><div>
</div><div>We will be running the shop and shipping orders as fast as we can right up until Christmas, if you’re hoping to receive your items before Christmas we recommend you place your order before the following dates: </div><div>
</div><div>UK:</div><div>1 st class: 18th Dec</div><div>Special Delivery: 20th Dec</div><div>
</div><div>Europe:</div><div>Airmail/Airsure: 10th Dec </div><div>
</div><div>Outside Europe (USA):</div><div>Airmail/Airsure: 8th Dec </div><div>
</div><div>Outside Europe (NZ/Australia):</div><div>Airmail/Airsure: 3rd Dec</div><div>
</div><div>If you don’t manage to get your order in before the dates above, don’t worry there is still a good chance it will arrive, we will be shipping as fast as we can right up until our local post office shuts on 23rd Dec.  </div><div>
</div><div>Merry Christmas or as we say in Welsh Nadolig Llawen.</div><div>
</div><div>
